divs: Sighting DetailsThis occured this evening. I was walking our dog in the yard. At 21:18. I looked up into the North-East sky and saw a VERY bright flash of light, at a very high altitude. It was there then gone. There was no sound. Two minutes later I saw an aircraft going in the general direction of the flash. That pilot may have seen the event also.
Summary: A very bright dot of white light light, comming on then going off. A flash.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sharon
There were no other sightings in Sharon on or around September 19th 2008
